text: I am trying to modify CSS but I cannot find where it is located in the system. It is not in the main CSS file of the site as the CSS that is rendered does not show on the template, just the page editor/preview. I can’t find where it is in the page editor either. In the source inspector it is below a bit of text that says <!-- Generated by the HubSpot Template Builder - template version 1.03 --> Any idea where I find this?
If you are using the (not-beta) drag and drop template then I think some of the CSS is unavailable/hidden from you
you can probably overwrite is by being more specific
I want to get rid of the font-weight: ligher !important I could override it locally, but I would like to be able to get rid of this CSS instead.
